# About {.unnumbered}

This collection of documentation details the workflow for calculating and presenting the Nature Index (NI) for Norway 2025. 
It constitutes a step by step walkthrough for: 

- Calculating and visualizing raw and scaled indicator data, including area-aggregated averages
- Calculating and visualizing NI2025 for all seven main ecosystems: forest, mountain, wetlands, open lowland, freshwater, coast, and ocean
- Running a qualitative analysis of the importance of different pressures
- Preparing data exports that form the baseline for presenting results on the website


For a presentation of all data and results, as well as references to further reading, plesae check out the official webpage: www.naturindeks.no [Currently being updated].
